description:
Third-party Pixiv client

Features

  • Login via built-in browser
  • Recommendation, illustration rank, timeline on homepage
  • Search
  • Illustration details, download original illustration, favorite, like, comment
  • Novel details, read, export, favorite, comment
  • Personal center, profile, favorite, follow, history, download manager
  • Illustration/novel filter (deleted illustration, no permission illustration, R18, R18G, AI)
  • Direct connection with DoH
